official-title.#text:
Providing for consideration of the bill
		  (H.R. 2668) to delay the application of the individual health insurance
		  mandate; and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2667) to delay the
		  application of the employer health insurance mandate, and for other
		  purposes.

committee-name.#tail:
,
			 reported the following resolution; which was referred to the House Calendar and
			 ordered to be printed

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
)
			 to delay the application of the individual health insurance mandate. All points
			 of order against consideration of the bill are waived. The bill shall be
			 considered as read. All points of order against provisions in the bill are
			 waived. The previous question shall be considered as ordered on the bill and on
			 any amendment thereto to final passage without intervening motion except: (1)
			 one hour of debate equally divided and controlled by the chair and ranking
			 minority member of the
